nodes.bodyText: My only question would be if there's a way to handle this without the copy, i.e. we have a version upstream with sample data turned on, or we allow a parameter for sample data so that it can be turned on without having to change the yaml file.

+should copy to `main2.yml` and edit to enable "sampledata". This config

nodes.bodyText: @donsizemore and I have been discussing this. I believe the strategy would be to improve the spin up scripts to pass multiple -g arguments to ansible and one of those could be "sampledata = enabled" (paraphrasing).
